It cannot be renewed from within Argentina, but you can apply for a different visa type if you wish to stay longer."}]]}],["$","$L30","1",{"value":"item-1","children":[["$","$L31",null,{"children":"Can I bring my family?"}],["$","$L32",null,{"children":"Family members can apply for accompanying visas. However, consult with a tax professional for your specific situation."}]]}],["$","$L30","3",{"value":"item-3","children":[["$","$L31",null,{"children":"Can I work for Argentine companies?"}],["$","$L32",null,{"children":"No, the Digital Nomad Visa is specifically for remote work with companies outside Argentina. Overstaying can result in fines and entry bans. You can reapply for a new Digital Nomad Visa after spending time outside Argentina."}]]}]]}]]}]}]}]
